Stethee

A wireless stethoscope that lets you track & monitor your heart and body sounds at home. It's simple to use and easy to understand.

Our heartbeat is the most important marker of our overall health.

Being able to monitor, track and understand this with a simple and elegant device in the comfort of your own home is something we could never do before.

Listen

When paired to your phone or to a bluetooth headset, Stethee streams high quality audio of your heart, lung and other body sounds.

When paired to your phone or to a bluetooth headset, Stethee streams high quality audio of your heart, lung and other body sounds.

Stethee app

The app receives, and store all data from Stethee. Valuable body sounds now can be analysed, and be understood easily
